_header: In every place men may see / When children to school set shullen be
Subjects: alphabetic poems; Passion, meditations on; Christ, Passion of
_description: An ABC poem on the Passion — 199 lines in 6-line stanzas

Bod789.Transcription:
I eueri place men mai seeWhanne children to scole sette schulen
                    be…
Bod789.Attributed Title:
Here is an abc of þe passioun of our lord ihesu crist þe whiche
                    is profitable to alle cristene men and wymmen to see & to knowe (f.
                    152)
